name: Incandescent One
movement: walk 30 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 60 ft.
description: The Incandescent One is a medium-sized celestial creature that embodies mobility, resilience, and powerful magical abilities. It has a glowing presence that emanates dim light within a 5-foot radius.
memorable: Its ability to inspire allies and see through illusions makes it a unique and invaluable companion in combat.
goals: Typically serves to aid allies in battle, using its magical abilities to enhance their capabilities.
relations: May interact with other celestial beings and can be an ally to adventurers fighting against dark forces.
environment: Usually found in areas of light or celestial energy, potentially near bodies of water due to its amphibious nature.
strengths: Possesses high mobility, multiple resistances, and immunities, along with powerful offensive and support magic.
weaknesses: While resilient, it may still be vulnerable to strong magical attacks; otherwise, it is difficult to incapacitate.
attacks: Can perform two powerful Slam attacks that inflict both bludgeoning and cold damage, or use three ranged Astral Bolt attacks dealing radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Celestial Inspiration allows it to inspire allies, providing them with an advantage on their next attack roll or saving throw.
senses: Possesses truesight out to 120 feet, allowing it to perceive hidden or illusionary creatures.
skills: Has a high passive perception of 17, enabling it to notice threats and hidden creatures easily.
additional_information: Aqueous Form allows it to traverse narrow openings.
Flyby ability prevents opportunity attacks while flying.
Immortal Nature means it does not require food, drink, or sleep.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can communicate telepathically with others within 120 feet.
test_queries: powerful celestial ally with healing abilities
mobile creature with truesight and flight
celestial being that inspires allies in combat
magical being immune to poison and various effects
explorer of both land and water with blinding light
